AD_Guard01_02.synopsis: AD between two guards in the Moonrise Tower warehouse

Guard02.synopsis: A guard in the Moonrise Tower warehouse. Responsible for transporting cargo to the docks - it's not the most exciting job, but she's just glad to be involved.

Guard01.synopsis: A guard in the Moonrise Tower warehouse. Looking forward to the coming war.

AD_Guard01_02_0.speaker: Zealot Soreni
AD_Guard01_02_0.text: You ought to be kinder, you know. To the prisoners, I mean.

AD_Guard01_02_6.speaker: Zealot Soreni
AD_Guard01_02_6.text: Any one of them could be elevated to True Soul, should they accept the Absolute.
AD_Guard01_02_6.context: NodeContext: Warning her friend that the prisoners they guard could just as quickly become their superiors

AD_Guard01_02_1.speaker: Zealot Zira
AD_Guard01_02_1.text: Ugh. Then I shall have to keep them busy praying for mercy from other gods, won't I?
AD_Guard01_02_1.context: NodeContext: Disgusted at the thought of 'vermin' becoming her superior

AD_Guard01_02_10.speaker: Zealot Zira
AD_Guard01_02_10.text: But we've seen, what? Five True Souls sent for an audience?

AD_Guard01_02_9.speaker: Zealot Soreni
AD_Guard01_02_9.text: And not a single one came back down from the tower-top. Must've been unworthy.
AD_Guard01_02_9.context: NodeContext: Finishing her friend's thought with an air of finality

AD_Guard01_02_7.speaker: Zealot Zira
AD_Guard01_02_7.text: It is impossible to keep a garment clean down here.

AD_Guard01_02_8.speaker: Zealot Soreni
AD_Guard01_02_8.text: You'll find it all the harder once we're off on the march.

AD_Guard01_02_4.speaker: Zealot Zira
AD_Guard01_02_4.text: If you think I'm walking all the way to Baldur's Gate without a litter, you don't know me at all.
AD_Guard01_02_4.context: NodeContext: Scornful - she's used to having slaves

AD_Guard01_02_3.speaker: Zealot Soreni
AD_Guard01_02_3.text: Oh, of course! Perhaps our prisoners can be your bearers. A fine view from gnome-back, I expect.

Guard02_0.speaker: Zealot Soreni
Guard02_0.text: All's well here. The cargo from below has already been taken to the docks.
Guard02_0.context: NodeContext: with a nod - you're doing menial work, and hoping not to be bothered

Guard02_1.speaker: Zealot Soreni
Guard02_1.text: Do I know you, True Soul? Feels like we met before - maybe in a previous life.
Guard02_1.context: NodeContext: shrugging off the moment of recognition on the last phrase, almost with a smile - these moments of recognition aren't always meaningful or real is the vibe

Guard01_0.speaker: Zealot Zira
Guard01_0.text: I hear we'll be marching west soon. Hope to see you on the front line.
Guard01_0.context: NodeContext: looking forward to the war that's coming

Guard01_1.speaker: Zealot Zira
Guard01_1.text: Don't get too close to the prisoners - they're desperate enough to try anything.
Guard01_1.context: NodeContext: A light-hearted warning - your thinking of the prisoners the same way somebody might think of a cornered animal
